full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I 'CHI BSLU NI BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I 'CHI BSLU 'DI BYED LUGS KYANG MI 'DRA BA SNA TSOGS 'DUG KYANG, ,BLA MA MCHOD PA DANG 'BREL BA'I 'DI NI RJE BTZUN DAM PA DZNY'A NA BADZRA GYIS SLOB MA THA SHAL BA BKA' BCU BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BGYIS PA 'DI LA NONGS PA'I TSOGS MCHIS NA MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS BZOD PAR MDZOD, ,DGE'O, ,)
